words.definition: This boy or man has the same mother and father as you.
words.audioText: He is a boy. His mother is your mother.

words.definition: A round fruit that is usually red, green, or yellow.
words.audioText: A round fruit that grows on trees. It is usually red, green, or yellow.

words.definition: A very large gray animal with a long nose called a trunk.
words.audioText: A very big gray animal. It has a long nose called a trunk.

words.definition: A flying insect with colorful wings.
words.audioText: A beautiful flying insect. It has colorful wings and flies from flower to flower.

words.definition: A thing you hold to keep dry when it rains.
words.audioText: You hold this when it rains to stay dry. It opens up like a flower.

words.definition: An electronic machine that can store and process information.
words.audioText: An electronic machine. You can use it to work, play games, and watch videos.

words.definition: A round food made with bread, cheese, and tomato sauce.
words.audioText: A delicious round food. It has bread, melted cheese, and tomato sauce on top.

words.definition: A colorful arc that appears in the sky after rain.
words.audioText: A beautiful colorful arc. You can see it in the sky when the sun comes out after rain.

words.definition: A very large animal that lived millions of years ago.
words.audioText: A huge animal that lived long, long ago. Some were as big as a house!

words.definition: A colorful part of a plant that smells nice.
words.audioText: A pretty and colorful part of a plant. It smells very nice and bees like to visit it.

questionTypes.name: 文字题干
questionTypes.description: 在屏幕上显示题目描述

questionTypes.name: 音频题干
questionTypes.description: 通过语音朗读题目描述

answerTypes.name: 选择题
answerTypes.description: 从多个选项中选择正确答案

answerTypes.name: 填空题
answerTypes.description: 根据提示填写完整单词
